body:
I'm not making this to start lots of hate and people making stuff up  because I have got my suspicions what happened just wanted to know for sure also why is nebula down sorry for being a pain asking but this also saves other discussions about this topic ! Thanks .

We think it was a DDOS attack on Avicus due to the website is hosted by the same host and the server so that why the message showed up when you tried reloading the website ! Please correct me if I'm wrong !

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Nebula is BACK up !

It was said NOT to be a DDOS attack !

title: Why was Avicus down ?

replies.body: There was a small problem, I heard this had been solved! If not then I suggest waiting for a while, here have a dorito.

replies.body:
"due to the website is hosted by the same host and the server so that why the message showed up when you tried reloading the website ! Please correct me if I'm wrong !"

OVH has DDoS-Protection, the Avicus Minecraft Server (198.27.103.xx) is hosted by OVH (canadian servers) Avic.us can't be ddosed (except if experts are trying to, but I don't think they would waste their time for ddos'ing a minecraft server...

GoDaddy is another webhoster, Kylo uses this for his Website(s) and maybe databases (idk) The Avicus Website Server (104.28.31.38) is hosted by GoDaddy.
And in a way DDoS-protected by Cloudflare (I don't really know how this works, because I never used it by myself)

"by the same host"
is incorrect.

"Please correct me if I'm wrong !"
done! :>

https://www.cloudflare.com/ddos for more information...
And yea, please correct me if I'm wrong or if all informations here are wrong, archive this post. ^^
